assignments.description: This assignment will count the number of active alerts
assignments.name: assNumberofActiveAlerts
assignments.label: assNumberofActiveAlerts

assignments.description: This element will set all selected rows to inactive
assignments.name: assSettoInactive
assignments.label: assSettoInactive

decisions.description: This element will check if there are any active alerts.
decisions.name: dcsActiveAlerts
decisions.label: dcsActiveAlerts

decisions.description: This decision will check if there are more than three active alerts on this account. There's a max of four.
decisions.name: dcsActiveNumberofAlertsMoreThan3
decisions.label: dcsActiveNumberofAlertsMoreThan3

decisions.description: This element will check which button is pressed on the previous screen
decisions.name: dcsButton
decisions.label: dcsButton

decisions.description: This element checks which button is pressed.
decisions.name: dcsButtonPressed
decisions.label: dcsButtonPressed

Flow.description: This screenflow gives the user the option to add a new Alert (toast message) to the account record. This is added on the lightning page.

formulas.description: Extracts this user language code from the current user.
formulas.name: fmUserLanguageCode

Flow.interviewLabel: Account - SCFL01 - Add New Alert to Account Record {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Account - SCFL01 - Add New Alert to Account Record

loops.description: This element will loop through all the selected rows (alerts).
loops.name: lpSelectedAlerts
loops.label: lpSelectedAlerts

recordCreates.description: This element will create a new alert based on the input from the user.
recordCreates.name: rcAlert
recordCreates.label: rcAlert

recordLookups.description: This element will retrieve all active alerts
recordLookups.name: getAllActiveAlerts
recordLookups.label: getAllActiveAlerts

recordUpdates.description: This element will set all the selected alerts to inactive.
recordUpdates.name: ruAlerts
recordUpdates.label: ruAlerts

fields.name: dtTitle
fields.fieldText:
Please select if you would like to add a new alert or deactivate alert(s).

ï»¿

fields.name: dtMode
fields.fieldText:
• Dismissible will display the toast message until the close button is clicked or the duration time has elapsed.
  • Pester will display until the duration time has elapsed. No close button will be available.
  • Sticky will remain displayed until the close button is pressed

fields.name: nrSequence
fields.helpText: The sequence determines which alert is shown first. Only 4 active alerts are allowed.

fields.name: txtTitle
fields.helpText: The title is optional. If you enter a title it will be on the first line with a bigger font and the message will be placed on the second line with a smaller font.

fields.name: txtURLLabel
fields.helpText: Optional: This is the Label for the link in your message. To include a clickable link in the message, place the characters {url} in your message. At run-time the message will be updated to replace {url} with the value of your URL Label parameter and it will link to the address you specified in the URL Link parameter.

fields.name: urlLink
fields.helpText: Insert an external link (for example an important news article) or an internal link in Salesforce to for example an opportunity record.

fields.name: dtiStartDate
fields.helpText: From what time should we start showing this alert?

fields.name: nrDuration
fields.helpText: How many seconds do we need to show this alert?

fields.name: dtiEndDate
fields.helpText: Till what time should we show this alert?

fields.name: dtDescription
fields.fieldText:
Only 4 active Alerts are allowed.

Please select one or multiple alerts that need to be deactivated and click next to create a new alert.

fields.name: dtSuccess
fields.fieldText: The alert(s) have been deactivated.

fields.name: dtCreate
fields.fieldText:
The alert has successfully been created.

The activation process is scheduled, so it can take up to a minute to see the new alert on the screen.

subflows.description: This subflow routes to the fault connector.
subflows.name: subFaultConnector
subflows.label: subFaultConnector

value.stringValue: Account - SCFL01 - Add New Alert to Account Record

variables.description: To count how many times the loop has runned.
variables.name: Counter

variables.description: Variable to hold the Account Record Id that is being edited (via quick action or a lightning component).
variables.name: recordId
